page_content: The page discusses the responsibilities of water supply companies in ensuring the quality of drinking water.
The page provides information about software for filling out tax returns.
The page provides contact information for tax-related queries, including a HelpDesk for tax software.
The page archives newsletters related to tax matters, including updates on tax software.
The page provides an overview of the historical archives maintained by the State Archive of Lucerne.
The page provides financial and statistical information about the state budget.
